onShutter().Description: Called as near as possible to the moment when a photo is captured from the sensor. This is a good opportunity to play a shutter sound or give other feedback of camera operation. This may be some time after the photo was triggered, but some time before the actual data is available.
onShutter().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 21

ClassDesc: We recommend using the new @B_android#hardware#camera2#package-summary_E@ API for new applications. Callback interface used to signal the moment of actual image capture.
